1: curl --fail localhost:8787/api/v1/system/status?apiKey=`IFS=\> && while read -d \< E C; do if [[ $E = "ApiKey" ]]; then echo $C; fi; done < /config/config.xml`

0:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.lobby
  - slashserver.survival
  - slashserver.survival2
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
  family:
  - bungeecord.server.survival
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1eviljungle lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mc-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Survival SMP'
    address: mcsv-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival2:
    motd: 'Public Survival EZ-mode SMP'
    address: mcsv2-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3eviljungle &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  billimek:
  - admin
  - family
  AnsleyElla:
  - family
  BrinleyHarper:
  - family
1:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.creative
  - slashserver.survival
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN} lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mccr-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Survival'
    address: mc-survival-minecraft:25565
    restricted: true
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN3} &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  EthanDstroyr:
  - admin

/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.title: redis helm release
/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.name: redis
/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.doc:
Redis is an open-source, in-memory data structure store that is used as a database, cache, and message broker. It provides a fast and flexible solution for storing and retrieving data, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of use cases, including real-time analytics, session management, and more.

Redis is used by Authentik, Authelia, oauth2-proxy.

0: animarr_main, authentik, grafana, home_assistant, immich, lidarr_main, postgres, prowlarr_main, radarr_main, sonarr_main, vaultwarden

- name: ansible-cfg
  configMap:
    defaultMode: 420
    items:
      - key: ansible.cfg
        path: ansible.cfg
    name: awx-extra-configs

1:
provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"
